metadata.title: CVE-2022-2990 buildah: possible information disclosure and modification (low)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: An incorrect handling of the supplementary groups in the Buildah container engine might lead to the sensitive information disclosure or possible data modification if an attacker has direct access to the affected container where supplementary groups are used to set access permissions and is able to execute a binary code in that container.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
buildah is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
